alert.note: Alert for Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 01 at 3:04PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF TIOGA...BROOME...AND SUSQUEHANNA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 304 PM EDT, a band of heavy snow was over Greater Binghamton Airport moving southeast at 30 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Binghamton, Vestal, Johnson City, Endicott, Kirkwood, Conklin, Maine, Susquehanna, Susquehanna Depot, and Port Dickinson. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 1 and 7. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 67 North and 78. Interstate 88 between 1 and 4. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 223 and 230. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
